characters.name: Dr. Elena Vasquez (Client)
true_knowledge: Discovered suspicious financial transactions in court system while investigating security breach
Judge Blackwell contacted her about irregularities he noticed
Someone with administrative access was manipulating digital records
Her forensics software 'CyberTrace' was stolen from her office 3 days before murder
what_she_hides: Was conducting unauthorized investigation into court finances
Had been secretly monitoring court network for weeks
Fears her investigation methods were legally questionable
characters.motivations: Wants to expose corruption in the justice system, restore her professional reputation

characters.name: Chief Clerk Marcus Sterling
true_knowledge: Has been embezzling court funds for 3 years using digital manipulation
Judge Blackwell discovered irregularities and was going to expose him
Stole Elena's CyberTrace software to access systems without detection
Planted digitalis in judge's coffee during afternoon break
what_he_hides: His knowledge of digital forensics (claims to be computer illiterate)
characters.motivations: Protect his theft scheme, maintain his trusted position, frame Elena

characters.name: Deputy Clerk Sarah Chen
true_knowledge: Marcus has been working late nights recently
Judge Blackwell seemed troubled about financial discrepancies
Elena's security badge was used to access restricted areas
Marcus asked unusual questions about the court's financial software
what_she_hides: Suspects Marcus of impropriety but fears losing her job
Saw Marcus near Elena's office the night her software was stolen
characters.motivations: Wants to do the right thing but fears professional consequences

characters.name: Detective Roy Harrison
true_knowledge: Elena was found with victim at 4:00 PM
Poison was digitalis, extracted from foxglove plants
Court security footage shows Elena entering at 3:30 PM
Financial records show suspicious activity in court accounts
what_he_hides: Is under pressure to close case quickly due to media attention
Doesn't fully understand the digital evidence
characters.motivations: Solve the case efficiently, maintain public confidence in justice system

characters.name: Dr. Margaret Foster (Victim's Friend)
true_knowledge: Judge Blackwell was investigating financial irregularities
He mentioned being concerned about someone with administrative access
He planned to meet with a digital forensics expert
He kept detailed personal notes about his investigation
what_she_hides: Has the judge's private investigation notes hidden in her office
characters.motivations: Honor her friend's memory, see justice done, protect his reputation
